extension.dc:title: Humboldt Inventory Event Extension
extension.name: Humboldt Inventory Event Extension
extension.dc:description: Extension to Event Core to capture inventory metadata.

property.name: inventoryPerformedBy
property.dc:description: Original Definition: The person or people who performed the inventory.

property.name: taxaIdentifiedBy
property.dc:description: Original Definition: The agent(s) who performed taxonomic identifications in the field.

property.name: identificationQuality
property.dc:description: Original Definition: How confident is the assessor in the quality of identifications on a scale from 1 (not confident) to 5 (fully confident).

property.name: siteCount
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Author-reported number of separate sites inventoried.

property.name: siteNestingDescription
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Author-reported hierarchical sample design e.g. sampled subunits nested with larger units.

property.name: siteNames
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Author-reported site names.

property.name: siteDetails
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Author-reported site information (utilizes terms below per site if more than one).

property.name: diurnality
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Author reported sampling during day, night, or both?

property.name: season
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Did the author report seasons surveyed? Which ones (from a pick list).

property.name: environmentReported
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Controlled vocabulary includes "Environment reported by site", "reported but not by site", and "not reported".

property.name: habitatScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: A verbatim text description of the habitats reported as included in the surveys.

property.name: excludedHabitatScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: A verbatim text description of the habitats explicitly reported as not included in the surveys.

property.name: reportedWeather
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Weather or climate conditions experienced during the survey (e.g., drought, frost).

property.name: reportedImpacts
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Adverse conditions that affected the survey or survey sites (e.g., fire, floods).

property.name: compilationType
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Compiled data is ancillary data that was not directly collected by authors but assembled from other sources. Inventories can be compiled only, survey only, or both.

property.name: compilationSources
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Compilation types include expert and local knowledge, museum specimens, literature, or other sources.

property.name: inventoryType
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Inventory type can be restricted search, open search, opportunistic search, trap, incidental or adventitous or material sample. Recommend using a subclasee of bco:taxonomic inventory process.

property.name: searchGeometryType
property.dc:description: Original Definition: The shape of the search area can be rectangle, circle, line, or polygon.

property.name: isAbundanceReported
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Did the survey results include number of individuals captured per species? (yes/no).

property.name: isAbundanceCapReported
property.dc:description: Original Definition: What value, if any, was used a maximum cap on reported abundances? (yes/no).

property.name: isVegetationCoverReported
property.dc:description: Original Definition: In vegetation surveys, was cover metric reported as output (yes/no).

property.name: isAbsenceReported
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Did the authors report species expected in the survey that were not found? (yes/no).

property.name: hasVouchers
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Did the authors collect specimen vouchers? (yes/no).

property.name: voucherLocations
property.dc:description: Original Definition: If collected, the name of the repository where vouchers were deposited.

property.name: hasSamples
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Did the author collect samples from organisms during the survey?

property.name: sampleTypes
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Sample types include blood, tissue, fecal, etc.

property.name: hasTraits
property.dc:description: Original Definition: This explicitly refers to physical measurements e.g. length, mass, etc. (yes/no).

property.name: compilationEffortLevel
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Measured as "low, medium and high" and discussed in more detail in paper text.

property.name: isEffortReported
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Measured as "no/partial/complete".

property.name: effortCalculatedBy
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Was the final assessment of effort reported directly by author or an assessment by data entry person?

property.name: effortCalculationProtocol
property.dc:description: Original Definition: If calculated, what data and what method were used to determine assessment of effort?

property.name: isTaxonCompletenessReported
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Choices for this field: "No, not reported", "Yes, reported as complete", "Yes, reported as incomplete".

property.name: taxonCompletenessMethod
property.dc:description: Original Definition: If author reported their assessment of incompleteness, capture author reported measurement or inferred assessment of incompleteness.

property.name: minimumTaxonCompleteness
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Inferred lower bound completeness is captured in quartiles (0, 25, 50, 75, 100).

property.name: maximumTaxonCompleteness
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Inferred upper bound completeness is captured in quartlies (0, 25, 50, 75, 100).

property.name: inferredTaxonCompletenessMethod
property.dc:description: Original Definition: A description of the rationale for the inferred completeness assessment often based on how well sampling was done across the geospatial scope, and the survey and compilation effort.

property.name: identificationReferences
property.dc:description: Original Definition: The published reference to the taxonomic authority used in the checklist.

property.name: taxonomicScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Set of searched species during inventory.

property.name: excludedTaxonomicScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Set of species explicitly excluded from the inventory.

property.name: lifeStageScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Type(s) of individuals included when sampling due to developmental stage. Pick list: "Adult / Reproductive / Juvenile / Larval / Seedling / Vegetative / Reproductive".

property.name: excludedLifeStageScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Type(s) of individuals excluded when sampling due to developmental stage. Pick list: "Adult / Reproductive / Juvenile / Larval / Seedling / Vegetative / Reproductive".

property.name: degreeOfEstablishmentScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Distributional status explicitly included in inventory. Pick list: "Native / Non-Native / Invasive / Naturalized".

property.name: excludedDegreeOfEstablishmentScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Distributional status explicitly exluded in inventory. Pick list: "Native / Non-Native / Invasive / Naturalized".

property.name: growthFormScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Growth form explicitly included in inventory. Current controlled vocab. list: tree / shrub.

property.name: excludedGrowthFormScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Growth form explicitly excluded in inventory. Current controlled vocab. list: tree / shrub.

property.name: sizeClassScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Size classes included in the study for the prospective taxa (e.g., only small mammals).

property.name: excludedSizeClassScope
property.dc:description: Original Definition: Size classes excluded in the study for the prospective taxa (e.g., only small mammals).

property.name: absentTaxa
property.dc:description: Original Definition: List of taxa reported absence(s) at whatever taxonomic level reported.
